static void EDMA_clearErrors ( EDMA_hwAttrs_t const *  hwAttrs,
uint32_t  ccBaseAddr,
EDMA_errorInfo_t const *  errorInfo 
)
static

Description
Utility function to clear EDMA errors.

Parameters
[in]hwAttrspointer to hardware attributes.
[in]ccBaseAddrcc base address.
[in]errorInfopointer to error information which is used to determine what errors will be cleared so that hardware can detect new errors.
Return values
None.
static void EDMA_configQueuePriority ( uint32_t  ccBaseAddr,
uint8_t  transferController,
uint8_t  priority 
)
static

Description
Utility API to configure queue priority. It exploits the symmetric structure of QUEPRI registers.

Parameters
[in]ccBaseAddrCC base address.
[in]transferControllerTC (or queue) Id.
[in]priorityQueue priority to be configured.
Return values
None.
static void EDMA_configQueueThreshold ( uint32_t  ccBaseAddr,
uint8_t  queueId,
uint8_t  threshold 
)
static

Description
Utility API to configure queue threshold. It exploits the symmetric structure of QWMTHR(A/B) registers.

Parameters
[in]ccBaseAddrCC base address.
[in]queueIdQueue Id of the queue to be configured.
[in]thresholdQueue threshold to be configured.
Return values
None.
static void EDMA_configTransferControllerError ( uint32_t  tcBaseAddr,
bool  isEnableAllErrors,
EDMA_transferControllerErrorConfig_t const *  config 
)
static

Description
Utility API to configure a transfer controller's error detection settings.

Parameters
[in]tcBaseAddrTC base address.
[in]isEnableAllErrorstrue if all error checking is to be enabled.
[in]configPointer to EDMA_transferControllerErrorConfig_t when selective errors are to be configured.
Return values
None.
static void EDMA_error_isr ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Description
CC error isr which will trigger when any CC errors happen. It will call application registered error call back function with the error information.

Parameters
[out]argEDMA_Handle which was set when Isr was registered using OSAL API HwiP_create.
Return values
None.

Description
Utility function to get error status information.

Parameters

[in]ccBaseAddrcc base address.
[out]errorInfopointer to error information in with status of errors will be populated.
Return values
None.
static bool EDMA_isError ( uint32_t  ccBaseAddr)
static

Description
Utility function to check if any of the EDMA errors happened. Suitable for polling purposes.

Parameters
[in]ccBaseAddrCC base address.
Return values
trueif any EDMA error else false
static void EDMA_paramSetConfig_assist ( uint32_t  ccBaseAddr,
uint16_t  paramId,
EDMA_paramSetConfig_t const *  pSetCfg 
)
static

Description
Utility function for configuring a PaRAM Set. Note: HW_WR_FIELD32 APIs are avoided for (assumed) efficiency when writing param fields (avoid unnecessary masking because fields are defined to be right sized (e.g aCount is uint16_t, matching Param ACNT size).

Parameters
[in]ccBaseAddrCC base address.
[in]paramIdPaRAM Set Id.
[in]pSetCfgPointer to PaRAM Set configuration.
Return values
None.
static int32_t EDMA_startTransfer_assist ( EDMA_Handle  handle,
uint8_t  channelId,
uint8_t  channelType,
bool  isStaticSet 
)
inlinestatic

Description
Utility function for starting a transfer.

Parameters
[in]handleEDMA handle.
[in]channelIdchannel Id.
[in]channelTypechanned Type.
[in]isStaticSettrue if STATIC bit is to be set else false.
Return values
oneof Error Codes
static void EDMA_transferComplete_isr ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Description
Transfer Completion Isr which will trigger when a channel transfer completes and if the channel is configured for a non-NULL completion call back function during channel configuration. Checks which transfer completion codes are set and calls the corresponding registered application call back function.

Parameters
[in]argEDMA handle which was set when Isr was registered using HwiP_create OSAL API.
Return values
None.
static void EDMA_transferController_error_isr ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Description
TC error isr which will trigger when any TC errors happen. It will call application registered error call back function with the error information, the error information will also report which transfer controller Id was triggered.

Parameters
[out]argpointer to EDMA_transferControllerErrorIsrArgInfo_t which was set when the ISR was registered using HwiP_create OSAL API.
Return values
None.
static void EDMA_update_queue_entries ( uint32_t  qEntry0Addr,
uint32_t  qEntryAddrJump,
uint8_t  numEntries,
uint8_t *  qEntryIndx,
EDMA_queueEntryInfo_t *  qEntry 
)
static

Description
Utility function to update queue entry event number and event type information as read from the QxEy registers. Exploits the symmetric structure of these registers.

Parameters
[in]qEntry0AddrAddress of queue entry 0.
[in]qEntryAddrJumpQueue entry address jump.
[in]numEntriesNumber of entries to iterate on.
[in,out]qEntryIndxPointer to queue entry index. Will be incremented in a circular manner.
[out]qEntryPointer to queue Entry array which needs to be populated.
Return values
None.

Utility function for validating parameters relalted to param configuration.

Parameters

[in]hwAttrsPointer to hardware attributes.

[in]configPointer to PaRAM Set configuration structure.
